content:
To set up your Service Catalog Site using the LWR framework, follow these steps:

The Service Catalog site requires the Service Catalog User permission set and a Channel Account license.

Use the Build Your Own (LWR) template, which is highly customizable and supports only data categories. This template provides a standard Home page that you can configure to your preferences.

Before starting, ensure you have data categories created and reviewed the LWR Service Catalog Site Guidelines.

Add Data Categories to your site to provide an intuitive site indexing of all your catalog items, categories, and their hierarchies.

Set up the:

* Home Page to display featured catalog items
* Navigation Menu tab for easy access to browse catalog items
* Search Page with a search bar for customers to find catalog items
* Service Catalog Site Pages for customers to browse your catalog

Change the Data Category Path shown in your site using Salesforce Workbench.

Required editions: Available in Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions with the Customer Service Catalog add-on license.
title: Setting Up a Lightning Web Requirements (LWR) Service Catalog Site
